CustomField.description: Targets the Promotion by Segment. When using this field, only the Members who are part of the selected Segment(s) can participate in the Promotion. Segments are configured in the Programs tab.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To target your Promotion by Segment, add the Segment(s) you want to make eligible. If blank, all Program Members will be eligible. You can view, edit and create Segments in the Programs tab.
CustomField.label: Segment
